original: @269b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @269b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i ma h'a k'a la sto tra /
analyzed: shr'i ma h'a k'a la sto tra /
translated: Shri Mahakalastotra

original: bod skad du /游댷dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa //
analyzed: bod skad du / dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa //
translated: In Tibetan:游댷Praise to Glorious Mahakala

original: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage and praise to glorious Mahakala!游댷Emanated from the body, speech, and mind

original: bcom ldan dpal chen grags pa yi //游댷sku gsung thugs las sprul pa yis //
analyzed: bcom ldan dpal chen grags pa yi // sku gsung thugs las sprul pa yis //
translated: Of the Bhagavan, the greatly renowned glorious one,

original: nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung ste //
analyzed: nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung ste //
translated: Arising from his heart center,

original: sprul pas 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: sprul pas 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the emanation who tames.

original: h'um gi de nyid las bzhengs pa'i //
analyzed: h'um gi de nyid las bzhengs pa'i //
translated: Arisen from the reality of HUNG,

original: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
translated: With one face and two arms,

original: sku mdog @270a * //
analyzed: sku mdog @270a * //
translated: Dark blue in color,

original: nag po 'bar ba che //
analyzed: nag po 'bar ba che //
translated: Greatly blazing,

original: bstan pa srung la phyag 'tshal bstod //游댷thod pa rnam gsum 'bar ba yi //
analyzed: bstan pa srung la phyag 'tshal bstod // thod pa rnam gsum 'bar ba yi //
translated: I pay homage and praise the protector of the teachings.

original: gzhal yas gur gyi nang na bzhugs //
analyzed: gzhal yas gur gyi nang na bzhugs //
translated: Residing within the celestial palace of the blazing three skulls,

original: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang bdud rnams mnan //
analyzed: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang bdud rnams mnan //
translated: With the right leg bent and the left extended, trampling on Mara,

original: 'gying bag brjid la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'gying bag brjid la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the one with majestic splendor.

original: ma chags thabs kyi padma mdzes //
analyzed: ma chags thabs kyi padma mdzes //
translated: The lotus of skillful means, free from attachment,

original: shes rab ye shes nyi ma'i dkyil //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes nyi ma'i dkyil //
translated: Is the sun mandala of wisdom and awareness.

original: h'um las skyes pa'i dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: h'um las skyes pa'i dpa' bo ni //
translated: The hero born from HUNG,

original: bstan pa bsrungs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: bstan pa bsrungs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to the protector of the teachings.

original: g-yas kyi gri gug gdengs pa yis //
analyzed: g-yas kyi gri gug gdengs pa yis //
translated: With the unsheathed flaying knife in the right hand,

original: dgra bgegs 'dul zhing bdud mgo gcod //
analyzed: dgra bgegs 'dul zhing bdud mgo gcod //
translated: You tame enemies and obstructors and cut off the head of Mara.

original: nyon mongs dug gsum rtsad nas 'joms //
analyzed: nyon mongs dug gsum rtsad nas 'joms //
translated: You utterly destroy the afflictions and three poisons.

original: dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Hero, I pay homage and praise you.

original: bdud kyi thod pa bdud rtsis bkang //
analyzed: bdud kyi thod pa bdud rtsis bkang //
translated: The skull cup of Mara is filled with amrita,

original: nyid kyi zhal du gsol bar mdzad //
analyzed: nyid kyi zhal du gsol bar mdzad //
translated: Which you consume with your mouth.

original: sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol //
translated: You grant spiritual powers to the practitioner.

original: byin rlabs 'bebs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: byin rlabs 'bebs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, the one who bestows blessings.

original: zhal nas khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa //
analyzed: zhal nas khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa //
translated: A stream of blood flows from your mouth,

original: bstan pa la gnod dal yams 'bebs //
analyzed: bstan pa la gnod dal yams 'bebs //
translated: Which brings down epidemics that harm the teachings.

original: dam tshig bsrungs la dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrungs la dngos grub stsol //
translated: You grant spiritual powers to those who keep their commitments.

original: thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod //游댷srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi //
analyzed: thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod // srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, the one with great compassion.游댷You wear a garland of the heads of all

original: mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas //
analyzed: mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas //
translated: Sentient beings of the three existences as a necklace.

original: dug lnga rtsad nas gcod pa ste //
analyzed: dug lnga rtsad nas gcod pa ste //
translated: You utterly destroy the five poisons.

original: dug gsum 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod //游댷mche ba gtsigs pas bstan pa la //
analyzed: dug gsum 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod // mche ba gtsigs pas bstan pa la //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, the one who conquers the three poisons.游댷With your bared fangs, you destroy the brains

original: gnod pa'i klad pa 'joms par mdzad //
analyzed: gnod pa'i klad pa 'joms par mdzad //
translated: Of those who harm the teachings.

original: til tsam dag tu brlag par mdzad //
analyzed: til tsam dag tu brlag par mdzad //
translated: And reduced to nothing but sesame seeds.

original: mi mthun 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: mi mthun 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to the one who tames the unruly.

original: gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i //
translated: The one who tames all the wicked without exception,

original: rkang med 'gro bas sku la brgyan //
analyzed: rkang med 'gro bas sku la brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the body of the legless one,

original: zhe sngang rtsad nas gcod pa ste //
analyzed: zhe sngang rtsad nas gcod pa ste //
translated: Completely cutting off hatred at the root,

original: klu chen 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: klu chen 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to the one who tames the great n캐gas.

original: stag ni dpa' brjid rngam pa'i chas //
analyzed: stag ni dpa' brjid rngam pa'i chas //
translated: The tiger's majestic and fierce attire,

original: sham thabs rked la bcings pa yis //
analyzed: sham thabs rked la bcings pa yis //
translated: With the skirt tied around the waist,

original: dregs pa lha chen zil gyis gnon /
analyzed: dregs pa lha chen zil gyis gnon /
translated: Overpowers the arrogant great gods,

original: dpa' chen bdud 'dul phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dpa' chen bdud 'dul phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to the great hero who tames the m캐ras.

original: bskal pa med dpung 'bar ba yi //
analyzed: bskal pa med dpung 'bar ba yi //
translated: The blazing army of the eon,

original: srid pa'i rtse mor rab tu 'bar /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mor rab tu 'bar /
translated: Blazing at the peak of existence,

original: bstan pa la gnod sgrol mdzad pa //
analyzed: bstan pa la gnod sgrol mdzad pa //
translated: Liberating those who harm the teachings,

original: 'bar ba'i rgyal po khyod la bstod //游댷da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i rgyal po khyod la bstod // da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
translated: I praise you, King of the Blazing Ones.游댷The one who protects the final teachings

original: tha ma'i bstan pa srung mdzad pa //
analyzed: tha ma'i bstan pa srung mdzad pa //
translated: Of all the tath캐gatas,

original: thad pa lnga yis dbu la brgyan //
analyzed: thad pa lnga yis dbu la brgyan //
translated: Adorned with five heads,

original: 'jigs 'god gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'jigs 'god gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to the one who goes with fearsome laughter.

original: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil //
analyzed: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil //
translated: The black-brown hair swirling upward,

original: bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa yis //
analyzed: bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa yis //
translated: By the perfect teaching,

original: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rtags//
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rtags//
translated: the sign of equality with the limits of space.

original: @270b rtags lnga ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: @270b rtags lnga ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to the one with five signs.

original: spyan gsum du ga gsum rtsad nas 'joms //
analyzed: spyan gsum du ga gsum rtsad nas 'joms //
translated: With three eyes, you utterly destroy the three poisons.

original: 'dul ba rnam pa bzhi gzigs nas //
analyzed: 'dul ba rnam pa bzhi gzigs nas //
translated: Having seen the four types of discipline,

original: gang la ci 'dul ji bzhin du //
analyzed: gang la ci 'dul ji bzhin du //
translated: just as it is, whatever is to be disciplined,

original: de 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: de 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: to that discipliner, I offer homage and praise.

original: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa slob dpon chen po aa wa dh'u t'i pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa slob dpon chen po aa wa dh'u t'i pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of glorious Mah캐k캐la composed by the great master Avadh콞t캶pa is complete.
